review_text: The Glossier Priming Moisturizer Rich is a luxurious treat for my dry skin, creating a smooth canvas for makeup. Love it!

name: Hydrating Cleanser
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Stearyl Alcohol
review_text: The CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser is gentle and effective for my sensitive skin. Love it!

name: Rapid Clear Stubborn Acne Cleanser
ingredients: Benzoyl Peroxide 10%, Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Petrolatum
review_text: The Neutrogena Rapid Clear Stubborn Acne Cleanser has been effective for my combination skin. Love it!

name: Tea Tree Oil
ingredients: Water, Alcohol Denat., PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil
review_text: The Body Shop Tea Tree Oil is a staple in my skincare routine. It helps keep my oily skin in check. Love it!

name: Ultra Repair Cream
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Colloidal Oatmeal, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Squalane
review_text: The First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream is incredibly rich and soothing for my dry skin. Love it!

name: XeraCalm A.D Lipid-Replenishing Cream
ingredients: Water, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil
review_text: The Avène XeraCalm A.D Lipid-Replenishing Cream has been fantastic for my sensitive skin. Love it!
